steps.name: And click on create Rate Card
And Enter "ESSPL_KART" in Rate Card name field
And Select Rate "Spot" in Rate type field
And Enter carrrier name in rate_card carrier field
And Select "Innovative Apparels" from the Customer dropdown
And Select "FCL" from the Service dropdown
And Select "Free Carrier" from the Inco dropdown
And Select "Collect" from the Payment dropdown
And select date for rate validity
And Enter "123456" in Named Account field
And click on save button for rates
And verify the rate save "Rate card  created successfully."
And import the rate card file
And verify the rate card "Rate card upload is in processing state."

parameters.name: Uploadmessage
parameters.value: Rate card upload is in processing state.

fullName: Verify the TMS functionality: The user should be able to create Rate card sucessfully
